Text:
How could you upload a torrent when TPB have database problems which makes it impossible to upload?

"We're experiencing some issues with the database. Please try again soon."

Has been like that for 2 days now.

I can't open this movie properly in any application. QT says it can't be opened, VLC gives me audio but no picture and MPlayer just crashes.

What's up?

You need a 3ivx or any other MP4 codec

Try the link below

http://www.3ivx.com/download/windows.html

Thanks, but I have the necessary codecs, 3ivx as a component and mp4 was an Apple technology and is built into QuickTime. I'm guessing this was encoded on a PC. I'm on a Mac but it should still open and play.
Have you tried an MP4 player?
Somebody seed im at 74 % but then last seeder ripped of il keep seein after
Thanks buddy!!! i was looking for this all over the place.......
Unfortunately at the thirty minute mark I'm having constant stuttering and skips.  It becomes unwatchable at that point.  Thanks anyways though.
Lithium, fix your computer, no problems on this end.
